reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan well-made, chic, and comfortable, with a weight that's heavy enough for chilly days while remaining warm without being too bulky.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 100% positive purchase
items.body: Thank you for a wonderful product This cardigan’s material feels luxuriously plush, smooth, and of fine quality. It’s of a perfect thickness, warmth, and looks elegant and distinctive. Fits me perfectly (I had ordered the large size last week, but turned out not the right fit, was small on me… ) I returned it and re purchased it in XL right away, and received it yesterday and wow, I’m very happy with this purchase, it fits, feels and looks just perfect. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best
items.body: Love the material and the sleek cut of this cardigan. So many other cardigans are bulky and add an unnecessary and flattering look. But this one because of the weight of the material hangs nicely, actually has some shape to it and is slimming. I have it in a tape and a black color and would recommended highly. Would definitely order this again. That being said, I actually retuned this one because the Amazon price was way too high and I found it much cheaper at my local Ross. If pride is not an issue for you, then please purchase this with confidence. A very high-quality product worth every penny. Looks professional and top-notch. Just the material alone is awesome. Read more
items.author: KimberLee M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: It’s comfortable and stylish Read more
items.author: cynthia Lou Jacobson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, cozy and stylish coatigan!
items.body: This was a great find, perfect for the cooler mornings, running errands or just chilling around the house. The neutral color tone was the right option for me as I tend to prefer quieter colors, but the khaki is also versatile. Wear it with a dress, jeans, pants, to work, around town, date night. Dress it up or dress it down! It’s a stylish coat for the fall, winter and spring. So far, there are few wrinkles and I have not needed to wash it. The medium size fits well around the waist and chest, but be advised the sleeves can be a tad bit short. I did not mind this as much. The quality is great and the softness of the fabric is smooth and cozy. The pockets are deep and within arm’s reach. I can fit my phone in these no problem. Read more
items.author: Althea B

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater but the fabric pills badly
items.body: This great warm sweater fits very well, but the fabric started pilling only a month after I started wearing it. I have to keep up with it constantly with a fabric shaver. The pilling is pretty bad and it is all over the sweater, not just in some small patches. Read more
items.author: Claudette Powell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sooo soft
items.body: For the price this really was a winner imo. I bought the khaki beige color. It’s a nice clean traditional cream color. So if you can’t wear white, Khaki Beige is definitely a great choice. As far as sizing goes, I think it’s pretty accurate. I chose a large and it fits as expected. I have a large midsection due to being a mother of 5. I could have gone up a size to get a little more room around that area. The shoulders and arms were perfectly oversized with a large so an xl probably would have been too much and end up looking bulky. I plan on wearing this around the house primarily to look a little more chic while being cozy instead of frumpy cozy. The coatigan itself is thick and super soft. So soft and so cozy and so amazingly soft!!! It will be amazing as the autumn chill sets in. It has double pockets which I love. Perfect phone holder while being cozy at home. And the fabric, while feeling thick, and soft, is nicely stretchy and hold its shape so it’s not toooo slouchy. I would totally order this in another color. I’m 5’6 and the bottom of the coatigan hits just below my knees. I wear size 14 pants and a large nearly closes on me with out any tugging. Leaves maybe an inch gap right at at mid section. 2 inchs at my hips. My arms are average length and the sleeves are not short. Maybe a hint long which is perfect for being cozy. Not long enough to cause problems with my hands and activities throughout the day. The sleeves fold/roll nicely and stay in place due to the structure of the fabric. If you want a roomy feeling and extra fabric around your midsection, I’d size up one. But if you want to wear it as part of a daytime outfit or any sort of professional environment and not look shlumpy, order your regular size and use as your outer most layer. Otherwise the arms and shoulders will be too bulky. Read more
items.author: James Crutchfield

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wardrobe must
items.body: Perfect length, color as described, soft, light weight, steamer removed wrinkles. Pockets are set a little high but doable. Size medium 5’8” 145 lb Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Color is not as it appears
items.body: I am 5’0” 142lbs and ordered a size medium- it fits perfectly, I think if I got the large it would be way too loose fitting. If you want a more loose fit, then maybe size up! Quality is really nice and thick, super comfortable material and I think would keep me pretty warm. Haven’t worn it out yet, as I just received it. My only gripe is I ordered the light camel color and it’s more of a light pink rather than a camel color. My assumption is that the brown is more like the camel color I was looking for as that looks like it only slightly darker but don’t take my word for it. I’m going to keep the one I purchased because I do like how it fits and it looks really nice, I’ll get over the color discrepancy. Read more
items.author: ArianaM

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Gray, Opal Green, Hot Pink, Black, Deep Apricot, Coffee, Deep Grey, Red, Pink, White, Orange Red, Khaki Beige, Caramel. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
